ch0107_00_dent/0101_0701_01_10:
Welc— Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I didn’t realize it was you.
ch0107_00_dent/0101_0701_02_10:
Sorry—I forgot I’m not working at a
restaurant right now. Let’s do our best today!
ch0107_00_dent/7101_0701_01_10:
I work as a waiter in Striaton City, but I’m
also a former Gym Leader.
ch0107_00_dent/7101_0701_02_10:
My approach to both is actually similar,
in a way.
ch0107_00_dent/7101_0701_03_10:
Whether I’m dealing with a customer or a
challenger, I treat them the same.
ch0107_00_dent/7102_0701_01_10:
I used to be one of three Gym Leaders of the
Striaton City Gym, which was run by me and
my brothers, Chili and Cress.
ch0107_00_dent/7102_0701_02_10:
We used to have heated arguments about
Pokémon.
ch0107_00_dent/7102_0701_03_10:
But we only clashed because we were all
serious about it—and about doing our best.
ch0107_00_dent/7103_0701_01_10:
People and Pokémon from around the
world aren’t the only things gathered
here on Pasio.
ch0107_00_dent/7103_0701_02_10:
I’ve seen specialty goods from other regions
sold at the market, too.
ch0107_00_dent/7103_0701_03_10: Would you like to go shopping sometime?
ch0107_00_dent/7104_0701_01_10:
A lot of people say I tend to give a polite
bow when greeting them.
ch0107_00_dent/7104_0701_02_10: I suppose it’s a habit from work.
ch0107_00_dent/7105_0701_01_10:
When I’m working as a waiter, I always
think one step ahead of who I’m serving.
ch0107_00_dent/7105_0701_02_10:
That way, I can anticipate my customers’
needs and provide the best possible service!
ch0107_00_dent/7105_0701_03_10:
Heheh! Should we see if I can guess yours,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0107_00_dent/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, great timing! I was just looking for you.
ch0107_00_dent/1701_0702_01_10: I’m sure it’ll be helpful on your adventures.
ch0107_00_dent/2501_0701_01_10:
Even among all of Pasio’s sync pairs, you’re
a special one.
ch0107_00_dent/2501_0701_02_10:
You’re fresh yet well honed...refreshing yet
inspiring...
ch0107_00_dent/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s odd. I don’t think I’ve ever met anyone
quite like you before.
ch0107_00_dent/2501_0702_01_10:
Whenever I’m around you, I have so much
fun battling.
ch0107_00_dent/2501_0702_02_10: I hope we can keep being teammates!
ch0107_00_dent/2511_0701_01_10: Chili and Cress have many qualities I don’t.
ch0107_00_dent/2511_0701_02_10:
That’s why I truly respect them—as family
and as fellow Trainers.
ch0107_00_dent/2511_0701_03_10:
And I respect you just as much,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0107_00_dent/2511_0702_01_10:
I think the tea my brothers and I brew
together is the best in Unova—
ch0107_00_dent/3001_0701_01_10:
The moment I wake up in the morning,
I start prepping to open our restaurant.
It’s a habit of mine from back in Unova.
ch0107_00_dent/3003_0701_01_10:
Even here on Pasio, I’m always careful to
say hello to everyone and look my best.
ch0107_00_dent/3005_0701_01_10:
Good work today. Before you go out
exploring again, would you like to take a
break with a cup of tea?
